definition: to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: A naughty monkey is yellow, yellow teeth.
sentences.chinese: 小猴更调皮，叫小黄“黄牙小子”。

sentences.english: But – honestly – he was trickier than most.
sentences.chinese: 但老实说，他比大多数人都调皮。

sentences.english: The children are always up to amusing tricks.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们总是调皮捣蛋寻开心。

sentences.english: This naughty boy the profile that picture choosing keeps from him Todd.
sentences.chinese: 这幅调皮男孩儿的画像选自托德自己写的小传。

sentences.english: "Oh you naughty Whisker, " said the old lady.
sentences.chinese: “唔，你这个调皮的威斯克呀，”老夫人说道。
她眼睛里闪烁著调皮的光辉。

sentences.english: His mother confined him to his room for two hours for his misbehavior.
sentences.chinese: 因为调皮，母亲把他关在房里两个小时。

sentences.english: That naughty little boy has grown into an outstanding bridge engineer.
sentences.chinese: 那个调皮的小男孩已成长为一名杰出的桥梁一程师。

sentences.english: I like this piece of sky blue, pure, yet mischievous.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢这片天空的兰色，纯净又不失调皮。

sentences.english: Becky was well-behaved at school but Adam was naughty.
sentences.chinese: 贝基在学校很守规矩，但是亚当很调皮。

sentences.english: Tom is a cute but mischievous child.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆是一个天真活泼而又调皮孩子。

sentences.english: We pissed our teacher off again today, horsing around and acting up.
sentences.chinese: 今天我们调皮捣蛋，又把老师给惹怒了。

sentences.english: Buy some naughty board games to play when the kids are asleep.
sentences.chinese: 买一些调皮游戏道具，在孩子熟睡之后玩。

sentences.english: Li Bai was naughty and disliked studying when he was a child.
sentences.chinese: 李白小的时候非常调皮，不喜欢读书。

sentences.english: Can the fish swim? Yes, she can.
sentences.chinese: 几条小黄鱼在水中调皮地游动。

definition: to cause trouble/to stir up trouble
to stay/to stop/to tease (play with)/amusing/short pause in reading aloud, equivalent to comma (also written 讀|读[dou4])
to only want to have a good time/to just want to have fun, and to shy away from self-discipline
